section.title: Trust Policies
section.t: The Relying Party evaluates Attestation Results against locally configured trust policies. This section defines the policy framework for Proof of Process evidence.

section.title: Assurance Levels
section.t: Four assurance tiers are defined, each requiring progressively stronger evidence:

list.t: Software-only attestation with behavioral entropy above minimum threshold.
T1 plus Sequential Work Function proof binding evidence to elapsed time.
T2 plus hardware-anchored timing from a trusted execution environment.
T3 plus continuous device attestation and environmental sensing.
